meanings.definition: Lasting for a long time but not permanently
meanings.sent1: The sticker on my notebook is semipermanent.
meanings.sent2: The paint on the wall is semipermanent.
meanings.sent3: I hope this semipermanent marker doesn't fade away too soon.
meanings.sent4: Her smile left a semipermanent mark on my heart.
meanings.sent5: The memory of that day is etched in my mind semipermanently.

meanings.definition: A product used to temporarily color hair
meanings.sent1: She applied the semipermanent dye to her hair.
meanings.sent2: The salon offers various shades of semipermanent hair color.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to use the semipermanent hair dye turned his hair green.
meanings.sent4: The semipermanent hair color transformed her look instantly.
meanings.sent5: The semipermanent hair dye washed out after a few weeks.

meanings.definition: A type of makeup that lasts longer than traditional makeup but is not permanent
meanings.sent1: She prefers using semipermanent makeup for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The actress wore semipermanent makeup for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to apply semipermanent makeup resulted in a funny mishap.
meanings.sent4: The semipermanent makeup gave her a flawless look all day.
meanings.sent5: The semipermanent makeup enhanced her features beautifully.
